snippet: The artist Daniel Brush, the subject of a survey at the Museum of Arts and Design, enjoys an esoteric success with his unorthodox jewelry.
abstract: Artist Daniel Brush, is the subject of a survey at the Museum of Arts and Design, showcasing his penchant for making jewelry not meant to be worn and sold only reluctantly.
lead_paragraph: The artist Daniel Brush, the subject of a survey at the Museum of Arts and Design, enjoys an esoteric success with his unorthodox jewelry.

headline.seo: Daniel Brush at the Museum of Arts and Design
headline.main: What He Prefers: Staying at Home to Spin Gold
headline.print_headline: What He Prefers: Staying at Home To Spin Gold
